programme.title: Kirstie and Phils Love It or List It
programme.desc: Rachael and Tim cant agree on whether to stay in their 1930s semi, or move somewhere more rural to bring up their two young children. Rachael longs for leafier pastures, but Tim would rather stay closer to his nearby friends and family.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Corfu holds a special place in Lisa and Waynes hearts, as its where they just got married. Can Laura Hamilton find them the perfect holiday home in Kassiopi for their £130k?

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Sallys after a family holiday home in Manilva, Spain for £190k. Craig Rowe shows her a quirky townhouse and a place with a tantalising terrace, but did one impress her in La Duquesa?

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: First to host in North Devon is eco campaigner Hector Christie, whos hoping to wow everyone with a selection of raw food delights and home grown produce. However, the guests are more amazed by Tapeley Park, the stately home he lives in!

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Its day two in North Devon and the turn of former cabaret queen and make-up artist Kirsten Brend to impress her guests. Kirsten hosts a Danish themed night, showcasing her roots.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me

programme.title: Come Dine with Me

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: The final night in North Devon sees retired housekeeper Viv Foster on hosting duty. Shes feeling confident about her posh dinner party after years of experience serving the rich and famous.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Martial arts expert Dan hosts the weeks final visit in Southport, where he aims to please with his no-nonsense approach to a classic seaside getaway. The bed and breakfast owners seem less positive about some cleanliness issues.

programme.title: Kirstie and Phils Love It or List It

programme.title: Operation Daybreak
programme.desc: In 1942 Czechoslovakia, SS-General Reinhard Heydrich is appointed to become the Reich Protector of Bohemia and Moravia. The terror and oppression that follow cause Allied authorities in London to authorise a secret mission to kill the man who has come to be known as `The Butcher of Prague. The film explores shows the operation leading up to Heydrichs death as well as the massive German reprisals that followed it.

programme.title: Natural World
programme.desc: Welcome to the Penguin Post Office, a little bit of Britain in the heart of Antarctica. Inside, the post office has everything youd expect. Outside, things are a little bit different. Neighbouring the post office are 3,000 gentoo penguins. They are there to raise a family but their lives are far from picture postcard as adultery and robbery are rife.

programme.title: Angela Lansbury at the NFT
programme.desc: In a programme first broadcast in 1973, actress Angela Lansbury talks to American columnist Rex Reed and answers questions from members of the audience at Londons National Film Theatre. Featuring extracts from her films, including The Picture of Dorian Gray, The Harvey Girls, Dark at the Top of the Stairs, The Manchurian Candidate and Black Flowers for the Bride.

programme.title: Mercury Prize

programme.title: The Blues Brothers

programme.title: How to Get Ahead
programme.desc: Stephen Smith, explores Renaissance Florence under the reign of Grand Duke Cosimo Medici. Cosimos fledgling court prized the finer things in life and some of the greatest painters, sculptors and craftsmen in world history came to serve the Grand Duke. However, successful courtiers had to have brains as well as brawn. The canniest of them looked to theorists like Niccolo Machiavelli for underhand ways to get ahead, whilst enlightened polymaths turned their minds to the heavens, and to ice cream.

Jacqui is in north west London to see two flats that may be better reverting back to one.

Christina discovers the appeal of model railways with an avid collector of original Hornby trains.

programme.title: Lost and Found in the Lakes
programme.desc: The scuba team take on a familys epic 30-year search for grandads mythical missing motorbike.

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Wanting to leave town life behind them, this episodes couple have their sights set on a new countryside home in Northamptonshire, and Ginny Buckley is on hand to help them find it. Ginny also discovers a beautiful green space on the outskirts of Kettering, where the towns residents can recharge their minds, bodies and green fingers.

programme.title: The Repair Shop

On duty in this ecological oasis are officers Eddie Smith and Jen Ysseldyke, but during patrol they discover a car illegally parked inside this protected area. The officers eventually find the culprit, but in the process discover Officer Smith has accidentally locked the gate to the nature reserve, leaving everyone trapped inside.

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Emotions are running high during a house hunt in Herefordshire, where Sonali Shah is helping a couple to make a fresh start in the countryside after a life-changing event.

programme.title: Marcus Wareings Tales from a Kitchen Garden
programme.desc: Marcus plans to bring in some ducks, but things arent as simple as they seem as he heads out onto the lake to create a new home for them. Heading to Devon, he discovers the perfect breed for the smallholding and picks up some top tips and tricks on how to rear them.

programme.desc: Amy Murray is joined by Punk Chef, aka Scott Garthwaite to discuss food and peoples relationship with it.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: Twenty-four hours a day, the latest national and international stories as they break.

programme.title: Politics Live
programme.desc: Jo Coburn invites a panel of guests to share their opinions on the newsmaking stories of the day.

programme.title: Impossible
programme.desc: Thirty players compete across the series, scoring points by answering questions correctly. However, they must avoid the impossible answers, otherwise they will be eliminated from the show until the next day.

programme.title: The Finish Line
programme.desc: Roman Kemp and sidekick Sarah Greene host the quiz show where contestants race on moving podiums across the studio floor. Correct answers get the players moving, while wrong answers will stop them in their tracks.

programme.title: Unbeatable
programme.desc: Jason Manford hosts the quiz show where players face a question and pick from a board of six rankable answers. Some answers are good, but only one is unbeatable.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.sub-title: North West England: Starters and Fish
programme.desc: Four chefs compete for north west England with canapes, starters and fish dishes inspired by great Britons of the past. Who will be eliminated?

programme.title: Trawlermen: Hunting the Catch
programme.desc: Scalloper Golden Promise is pushing force-6 winds to get to newly opening scallops beds ahead of his rivals. With the boat first to the grounds, they are in for a big pay day - but only once they cover the £8,000 fuel expenses to get here. Family-owned trawler Adenia leaves Lerwick aiming to land 1,000 tonnes of mackerel in Norway in just three days time.

programme.title: Flog It!
programme.desc: Members of the public try to make money out of their antiques by taking a risk at auction.

programme.title: Richard Osmans House of Games
programme.desc: Una Healy, Joanna Page, Jack P Shepherd and Emmanuel Sonubi test their general knowledge skills on this weeks House of Games.

programme.title: Strictly Come Dancing: It Takes Two
programme.desc: Janette Manrara serves up more backstage gossip and behind-the-scenes action from the world of Strictly. Also, Strictlys costume designer Vicky Gill returns to showcase what some of the couples are wearing at the weekend.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Two northern entertainers go head-to-head as actor and comedian Crissy Rock faces personality, presenter and good pal Scarlett Moffatt. Giving the celebs a helping hand are antique pros Margie Cooper and Christina Trevanion.

programme.title: Highland Cops
programme.desc: On the Isle of Lewis, police hunt for suspected salmon poachers. In Glencoe, PC Stephen Cooper pursues a missing person case, and in Inverness, cops conduct drug raids in the city.

programme.title: Saving Lives at Sea
programme.sub-title: Saving Lives at Sea in World War II
programme.desc: In this special episode commemorating the 2024 bicentenary of the RNLI, Dermot OLeary will uncover the untold story of the institutions heroic efforts in the Second World War.

programme.title: The Celebrity Traitors: Uncloaked
programme.desc: Ed Gamble is joined by the latest banished and murdered celebrity Players as theyre told the identity of the Traitors for the very first time...

programme.title: Ordinary Love
programme.desc: Joan and Tom have been married for many years. There is an ease to their relationship that only comes from spending a life time together and a depth of love which expresses itself through tenderness and humour in equal part. When Joan is unexpectedly diagnosed with breast cancer, the course of her treatment shines a light on their relationship as they are faced with the challenges that lie ahead and the prospect of what might happen if something were to happen to her.

programme.title: Secrets of the Brain
programme.desc: From playing computer games with chimpanzees to studying modern relationships, Jim Al-Khalili investigates how the brain evolved and how they differ from AI.

programme.title: Cracking the Case
programme.sub-title: The Heist, the Hit and the Hunt
programme.desc: A series of seemingly unrelated events reveals a web of organised crime. How did an iPad found in the River Thames link a UK murder plot with a heist from a Swiss museum?

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! Mystery Incorporated
programme.desc: The team plan to hit the slopes on a ski holiday but soon learn of the disappearance of the Darrow family, along with their mansion, nearly 75 years earlier.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo, Where Are You!
programme.desc: Scoob and the gang are called to investigate a mysterious ghost clown who is haunting a local circus by hypnotising people to commit crimes for him.

programme.title: Whats New Scooby-Doo?
programme.desc: The gang accompanies a penguin back to its home in Antarctica and find a finned creature from the sea dragging victims to an icy fate.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Daphne always dreamed of meeting extra terrestrial life, but that dream becomes a nightmare when the gang gets caught up in the mystery of a scary alien monster!

programme.title: Scooby-Doo and Guess Who?
programme.desc: Scooby-Doo takes the gang to meet his good friend Lucy Liu at her art gallery in Queens. When one of her large humanoid modern sculptures comes alive and attacks them, the gang and Lucy have a real mystery on their hands.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Shaggy is surprised to see his old childhood first crush has become a goth. Embarrassed that he hasnt changed at all, Shaggy attends a goth party with the gang.

programme.desc: Grizzys dream about a female bear is suddenly interrupted when the Lemmings rush into the cabin. They have found a mask that can control dreams. Grizzy wants to take it to get his dream back.

programme.title: Our Black History Heroes

programme.title: Danny and Mick

programme.title: Gladiators: Epic Pranks

programme.desc: Whilst Dad searches for a faulty wire, Cosima and Big Lizard play tag in the ship and accidentally break Big Lizards bath bed! Where will he sleep now? And wheres that pesky wire?

When his search for Greenback proves fruitless, things go from bad to worse when Danger Mouse realises that the Baron has headed to the planets only 100 per cent waterproof building and Penfolds current location - Danger HQ!

programme.title: Danger Mouse

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Po collects lots of balloons and takes off into the air! Floating high above Teletubbyland, Po waves at Tinky Winky, Dipsy and Laa-Laa below. When the balloons pop, Po lands.

programme.title: Supertato
programme.desc: Evil Pea makes a scary monster from craft materials, but Supertato wants to be its friend.

programme.title: Roots and Fruits
programme.desc: Live from the Roots and Fruits theatre, its show host Pak Choi, who might be known by many names but sings about how shes `Always Pak Choi to You.

programme.title: Tee and Mo
programme.desc: Tee helps Mo make a cake but things get messy.

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Sula and Amma surprise Bing to show him Sulas sparkly painted butterfly face. Bing also wants a painted face, one that looks like Biteysaurus, and Sula says she can do it for him. Sula begins smothering his face in Biteys signature green, but when she accidentally adds purple spots, Bing is horrified! He wants Sula to go home. But then Flop adds some teeth to Bings Biteysaurus, so he can really be Bitey.

programme.title: Colourblocks
programme.desc: Its lunchtime in Colourland! Red invites her friends for lunch, where they try each others favourite foods.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: The Squirrels are out tobogganing with Duggee when they spot a migrating bird fall from the sky.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Duggee and the Squirrels go on an adventure to find a famously shy creature called The Snard who doesnt like noise. Time to earn their Being Quiet badges!

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: When a heavy summer rain thunders over the Heeler home, Bluey is determined to dam the water in the front yard, while Mum tries to stop her constantly tracking mud into the house.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bluey, Snickers and Winton are on their way to ask Calypso for help with their problems, when they are ambushed by the Terriers and use their unique talents to get past.

programme.title: Go Jetters
programme.desc: The Go Jetters are finding out about an incredible fishy adventure called the salmon run. Every year, salmon swim from the oceans where they live all the way upstream to calm, shallow rivers to lay their eggs. On the way they have to leap up waterfalls, jump fish ladders and dash past hungry bears who try to catch them. Kyan thinks these fish are even better at fantastic gymnastics than he is! Ubercorn sets those co-ordinates for the Kenai River, Alaska.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.sub-title: The Tale of the Treehouse Rescue
programme.desc: When Peter is forced to reveal the location of the secret treehouse to Flopsy and Mopsy, the girls decide to hang out in Peters den - just as Old Brown launches a tree-top attack!

programme.title: Octonauts: Above and Beyond
programme.desc: Tracker and Kwazii help some fish whose food keeps getting stolen by a frigatebird.

programme.title: Numberblocks
programme.desc: Thirteen learns to jump and take away some blocks. What is left?

programme.title: Alphablocks
programme.desc: P, E and N take on a pesky pen, who can draw anything it wants to escape them. Is the pen mightier than the word, or can they outplay it at its own game?

programme.title: Nick Copes Popcast
programme.desc: With help from some kittens, Nick and the Popcasters put on a big concert at the old town hall for two very special mums.

programme.title: Justins House
programme.desc: Justin Fletcher entertains a live audience of children with singing, dancing and comedy chaos. Robert is trying to read a book, but Justin and Little Monster really want him to play with them instead.

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: At Ammas creche the children make eggy heads with egg shells and cress seeds. Bing knows his Eggy needs water, light and time before it can grow hair but waiting is hard. He tries to speed up the process by giving Eggy lots of water with the garden hose.

programme.title: Yakka Dee
programme.desc: Yakka Dee! celebrates children communicating - because talking fills you up with whizz, pop, bang! In this episode, Dee encourages a friend to say house and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see lots of different houses: a small house, a tall house and a hen house. Theres a lighthouse, a bright house, a bee house and a tree house.

programme.title: Lu and the Bally Bunch
programme.desc: When Declan struggles on his first visit to the pool, Lu puts her over-enthusiasm to one side and comforts him.

programme.title: Twirlywoos

programme.title: Something Special
programme.desc: Justin and his friend have fun outdoors riding a forest rollercoaster and bouncing high up in the trees. Meanwhile, Mr Tumble builds his own ride in his bedroom.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies go for a walk on a lovely sunny day, but then clouds appear, and it starts to rain. A rainbow shines in the sky, and a rainbow path gives the Teletubbies a magical trail to follow.

programme.title: The Baby Club
programme.desc: Giovanna and Baby Bear welcome babies Willow, Isobel, Lincoln, Ezra, Noah, Jason and their grown-ups. Inside everyones bags are building blocks which are explored through discovery, play, song and story.

programme.title: Maddie and Triggs
programme.desc: Due to a typical McGinty mix-up, Triggs ends up competing in an obstacle race. He soon discovers that playing to win and playing for fun are two very different things.

programme.title: Dylans Playtime Adventures
programme.desc: Dylan imagines hes a pilot wants to give his passengers an amazing flight, but he doesnt know where to land!

programme.title: Kiri and Lou
programme.desc: Kiri is having an ordinary kind of day and doesnt feel like doing much. But Panias extraordinary passing of wind makes the day amazing.

programme.title: Vegesaurs
programme.desc: Ginger the Tricarrotops explores the world of the crunchiest era, going on adventures throughout the colourful Vegesaur Valley.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Dad gets embroiled in a game of Hotel, where Bluey and Bingo run a crazy hotel and Dad is the beleaguered guest.

programme.title: Hey Duggee

programme.title: The Game Catchers

programme.title: Roots and Fruits
programme.desc: Live from the Roots and Fruits theatre, its Raspberry performing Its Cool to Be Kind, and being extremely kind and very helpful to everyone.

programme.title: Timmy Time
programme.desc: Timmy is determined to play with Otuss new remote-controlled truck. He tries more and more ambitious stunts, until disaster strikes and the truck is broken. Harriet helps make a new one out of odds and ends, but will it match up to the original?

programme.title: Our Family
programme.desc: George and Freddie love having fun. After a hearty breakfast, they fill their day with family `eggsperiments, art and even set up an obstacle course for Mum and Dad to complete. It looks easy at first until they learn they have to do it blindfolded.

programme.title: My World Kitchen
programme.desc: Charlottes dad is Irish and he has shown Charlotte how to make Irish boxty for her friends. Ireland is an interesting place and we learn all about it as Charlotte cooks her meal. She uses mashed and grated potatoes to make her boxty, and she flavours the potato mixture with lots of delicious ingredients including fresh rosemary. Charlotte thinks that rosemary smells like fresh air but some of her friends are not so keen and dont really like the taste of rosemary on its own.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Memorial Service
programme.desc: When Chandler jokingly posts an outrageous biography about Ross on Ross college alumni website, Ross retaliates in kind, sparking an internet war. Meanwhile, Monica gets extremely vigilant after a weak-willed Phoebe asks for help to stop her from contacting Mike after their relationship ends.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Hoping to win a huge jackpot, the friends pool their money and buy dozens of lottery tickets, but they argue over how to spend the fortune if they win, and Monica irritates everyone else by buying tickets just for her and Chandler. Exasperated, Phoebe takes the bowl of everyones tickets and threatens to throw it off the balcony. The others make up, but a pigeon startles Phoebe.

programme.desc: When Mike catches Mandy sneaking into the house late one night after being with Kyle, he wages his own form of psychological warfare on the couple to prevent it from happening again.

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: Mike hopes that hiring a private soccer coach for Eve will help her chances of getting a scholarship.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray helps Ally obtain a Pokemon-style trading card, a `Hackidu, which is all the rage with the kids in school.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Debra finally cooks a dish that Ray, Robert and Frank like, but Marie is not impressed.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray and Debra plan to get more time to themselves by getting Marie and Frank to make new friends, but all does not go to plan.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Debra pleads with Ray to allow her some time to herself without the family. Meanwhile, Marie is suspicious of her daughter-in-law, and Ray ends up spying on her.

programme.title: Spin City
programme.desc: Mike tries to talk the mayor out of joining a private club, and Stuart joins an all-female reading group.

programme.title: Spin City
programme.desc: Stacys grandmother puts a curse on Mike, who experiences a string of bad luck, and the mayor wont admit he is losing his hearing.

programme.title: Spin City
programme.desc: Mike buys Claudias engagement ring for Paul, and holds it until Paul can pay him back; Laurie has commitment on her mind when she shows up at the office.

programme.title: Spin City
programme.desc: While wedding plans for Mike and Laurie move along, other staffers fantasise what being married to Mike would be like.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Eddie Moves In
programme.desc: With Joey in his new apartment, Chandler gets a troublesome new flatmate, Eddie. Meanwhile, Phoebe makes a video for `Smelly Cat, and Ross and Monica find it nearly impossible to live together.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Dr Ramoray Dies
programme.desc: Joeys remarks to a fan magazine could cause him to lose his job playing Dr Ramoray on a daytime television drama, and Chandlers new flatmate Eddie becomes too annoying to cope with.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Eddie Wont Go
programme.desc: Chandler wants his annoying new roommate to move out, Joey is forced to face some exorbitant bills, and the girls learn from a book about personal empowerment.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Old Yeller Dies
programme.desc: Monicas new boyfriend impresses Chandler and Joey, Phoebe finds out what she missed as a child, and Rachel resents the fact that Ross is planning the rest of their lives together.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Monica is broke and decides to gamble on the stock market, and Chandler and Ross run into a couple of bullies in Central Park. Meanwhile, Rachel and Joey help Phoebe locate her father, but a vicious dog prevents Phoebe from finally meeting him. After accidentally injuring the dog with her car, Phoebe gets to know her fathers second wife whom she never knew about, and another long-lost family member.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Monica decides to hold a surprise birthday for Rachel, but everything goes wrong when Rachels estranged parents turn up unexpectedly. The party then splits into two factions: a dreary gathering in Monicas apartment, and a college-style drunken party at Chandler and Joeys flat.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Chicken Pox
programme.desc: Phoebes submariner boyfriend visits New York on leave from the Navy. Unfortunately, Phoebe catches chicken pox at baby Bens first birthday party. Meanwhile, when Monica realises that Richard has no real neuroses, she worries that she is too strange for him.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Barry and Mindys Wedding
programme.desc: When Rachel serves as a bridesmaid at the wedding of her ex-fiance Barry and her friend Mindy, she relives the nightmare of her own failed wedding day. Meanwhile, Chandler becomes enamoured with a woman he meets on the internet, but is surprised when he finally meets her.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Princess Leia Fantasy
programme.desc: Monica is distraught after her break-up with Richard. Phoebe unsuccessfully tries to raise her spirits, but ultimately its Mr Geller who comforts his daughter. Elsewhere, Chandler and Janice begin seeing each other again and Joey cant stand it. The two plan a day of fun to try to overcome Joeys aversions for Chandlers sake. Meanwhile, Rachel tells Phoebe and Monica about Rosss Princess Leia fantasy.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where No Ones Ready
programme.desc: In a race against the clock, Ross tries to get the gang dressed and ready for a black-tie benefit at the museum.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Monica decides the best way to get over Richard is to keep herself busy. She develops a `jam plan, hoping the distraction of cooking will divert her attention. After making jars and jars of jam Monica decides she still wants to have a baby, so she begins searching for a sperm donor, and comes across Joeys file. Elsewhere, Phoebe is mistakenly stalked by a man who thinks shes Ursula, and Chandler receives dating advice.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Metaphorical Tunnel
programme.desc: Ross panics when he sees his son with a Barbie doll, and Chandlers fear of commitment surfaces in his relationship with Janice.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebes attempts to introduce her visiting half brother Frank Jr to the delights of city life leave him thinking that she works in a brothel. Meanwhile, Ross lists five famous women that he would like to date. To his surprise, actress Isabella Rossellini, one of the women he rejected while narrowing down his list, pops in to Central Perk.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: When Janice asks whether any of the friends have ever dated one another the gang has a flashback to three years ago (one year before the pilot was supposed to have happened) when everyones lives were beginning to come together. Phoebe moves out of Monicas apartment, Chandler searches for a new roommate - ending up with Joey, Monica bumps into Rachel, and Ross learns that Carol is a lesbian.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Race Car Bed
programme.desc: When Monica buys a new bed from the Mattress King, the wrong one is delivered. Meanwhile, Joey sees Janice kissing her husband, and Rachels father clashes with Ross.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Giant Poking Device
programme.desc: Chandler and Janice reach a turning point in their relationship, while Monica accidentally injures Ben and tries to hide it from Ross.

programme.title: Jeff Dunham: Im With Cupid
programme.desc: Ventriloquist and stand-up comedian Jeff Dunham performs an all-Valentines Day themed special.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Joining Stan, Kyle, Eric and Kenny down in South Park for a dose of crude language and dark, surreal humour.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The boys find themselves in a magical land where the entirety of the worlds imagination is laid out in front of them. However, a terrorist plot threatens to spoil the occasion.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The government are holding Stan and Kyle until they reveal how they got into Imaginationland. Cartman is on a Rambo style quest to make Kyle holds up his side of the bet.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stan and Butters are stuck in Imaginationland and must fight for their lives against an army of imaginary evil forces, and Kyle and Cartman are still arguing in the Pentagon.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stan and Kyle are poised to hit the big time with their skills on computer game Guitar Hero. Their manager convinces Stan that Kyle is holding him back, and their friendship is tested.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The off-colour adventures of four elementary school boys.

programme.title: Beavis and Butt-head
programme.desc: The boys are hired to wash a Chevrolet Corvair in order to pay for new TV remote batteries, but decide to take it for a ride. They stop on a junction, where another car crashes into it.

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: The boys are back in Alaska (although Discovery dropped the states mention in the title after the first season) hoping to strike it rich mining for gold. Their first effort was anything but rich and glorious, however, as the crew led by Todd Hoffman and his father, Jack, sunk $250,000 into their dream and came away with just $20,000 worth of gold. The dismal summer was filled with injuries, malfunctioning equipment and constant fighting among the greenhorn miners, yet their serious case of gold fever trumps any talk of giving up and leads to a new operating plan in order to salvage their dream. The series also keeps tabs on the efforts of teenager Parker Schnabel and old-timer Dakota Fred to hit the mother lode at separate sites.

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: More adventures on the high seas off the coast of Alaska with the Dutch Harbor fishing fleet.

programme.title: Maine Cabin Masters
programme.desc: The crew are tasked with a relocation and land manifestation of a family yurt. With a budget of $15,000, the pressure is on to complete it on time.

programme.title: Maine Cabin Masters
programme.desc: A couple and their five children want to turn their recently purchased camp into a family vacation home. They create a beautiful place for the family to enjoy.

programme.title: Alaskan Bush People
programme.desc: The family join in with a competitive pheasant hunt in preparation for Thanksgiving. Then, Billy and Ami surprise the siblings with new additions to the homestead.

programme.title: Expedition Bigfoot
programme.desc: The team run into trouble whilst tracking a massive animal in the middle of the night. Russell hopes to find clues that explain the anomaly on his thermal scan.

programme.title: Expedition Unknown
programme.desc: After a potential new breakthrough, Josh returns to Guatemala, searching for a snake king tomb. Using new technology, he hopes to find the tombs location.

programme.title: Homestead Rescue
programme.desc: The Raneys struggle to revive an inherited Wyoming hill country homestead with a tragic legacy; to bring water to the property, Marty must solve the mystery of an untapped well; Misty and Matt combine forces on one of their most ambitious builds.

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters
programme.desc: The mining season is almost over and Cols crew take one last gamble opal-spotting from the air. The Cooke brothers strive to save their mega opal machine and disastrous season.

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters
programme.desc: The Rookies relationship is on the rocks as they battle their biggest claim yet as well as each other. With two partners working at different speeds, theres a fight brewing.

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: Fishing crews on the Bering Sea endure mortal peril and intense discomfort during crab season, with 12-metre waves, 318-kilogram crab pots that can easily crush a careless crewman, and freezing temperatures around the clock.

programme.title: Expedition X
programme.desc: A murderous monster is said to lurk in the vast swamplands near New Orleans. Phil and Jess investigate an ancient Cajun mystery surrounding a bloodthirsty werewolf-like beast terrorising the Bayou.

programme.title: Expedition Unknown
programme.desc: Josh Gates joins leading archaeologists as they investigate Americas first missing-persons case, The Lost Colony of Roanoke. Following newly discovered clues, he digs for answers to this 400-year-old mystery.

programme.title: Marooned With Ed Stafford
programme.desc: Adventurer Ed Stafford has walked the length of the Amazon River - he is the first person to accomplish that - and survived alone for 60 days on a desert island near Fiji (a feat chronicled in `Naked Castaway), so perhaps the challenges presented in `Marooned arent that daunting. Filmed in Venezuelas Gran Sabana mountains, Botswanas Okavango Delta, Romanias Carpathian Mountains, the Western Australia coast, and Borneos Brunei jungles, the five hourlong episodes see Stafford - a former British Army captain - attempt to last ten days in the harsh environments with nothing more than a camera. Viewers are provided a fly-on-the-wall perspective as Ed tries to find food, make fire, process water to drink, and build a shelter - among many other life-saving challenges.

programme.title: Naked and Afraid: Alone
programme.desc: All-star survivalist Ky struggles in the Amazon rainforest. He faces swarms of mosquitos, blood-thirsty piranhas and caiman-filled waters.

programme.title: Extinct or Alive
programme.desc: Forrest delves into the island of Java in Indonesia, seeking the Javan tiger. It was declared extinct in 2003, but there have been recent reported sightings.

programme.title: Marooned With Ed Stafford
programme.desc: Adventurer Ed Stafford has walked the length of the Amazon River - he is the first person to accomplish that - and survived alone for 60 days on a desert island near Fiji (a feat chronicled in `Naked Castaway), so perhaps the challenges presented in `Marooned arent that daunting. Filmed in Venezuelas Gran Sabana mountains, Botswanas Okavango Delta, Romanias Carpathian Mountains, the Western Australia coast, and Borneos Brunei jungles, the five hourlong episodes see Stafford - a former British Army captain - attempt to last ten days in the harsh environments with nothing more than a camera. Viewers are provided a fly-on-the-wall perspective as Ed tries to find food, make fire, process water to drink, and build a shelter - among many other life-saving challenges.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Jurassic
programme.desc: Welcome to a Cinema List 65 million years in the making, going through the very best moments from the Jurassic franchise - from the 1993 original to `Jurassic World: Dominion.

programme.title: One Shot
programme.desc: To prevent a terrorist attack on U.S. soil, a Navy SEAL team leader and a CIA analyst must retrieve a detainee from a secret compound while fending off an assault by insurgents.

programme.title: R.I.P.D.
programme.desc: Members of an odd police force chase monstrous spirits who try to escape their final judgment by hiding among the living. When the lawmen uncover a plot that could end all life, they must restore the cosmic balance.

programme.title: Terminator Salvation
programme.desc: After the triumph of the machines on Judgement Day and with killer robots hunting down the last vestiges of humanity, resistance fighter John Connor battles back. However, the arrival of a mysterious stranger threatens to tip the balance in favour of the machines.

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: Though struggling with the ramifications of his extraordinary origin and abilities, young Clark Kent must become a hero and save those he loves from a dire threat.

programme.title: Madame Web
programme.desc: After showing signs of clairvoyance, New York City paramedic Cassandra Webb must confront revelations about her past and protect three young women from a mysterious adversary who wants them dead.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: Oscar-winning World War II tale combining the story of an unusual rescue mission with an overwhelmingly powerful re-creation of the D-Day landings. A group of American soldiers are dispatched to locate one man among thousands, a US private whose three brothers have all been killed in action. The powers that be want to send him home to his family.

programme.title: Hellboy
programme.desc: Though the Nazis fail to open the gates of Hell, one little devil gets through. Raised at a secret FBI lab, Hellboy is a cigar-chomping, crimson demon with a breezeblock for a right hand and a gift for fighting otherworldly beasts. Lively action fantasy based on the cult comic book.

programme.title: Rambo
programme.desc: The eponymous commando is coaxed out of retirement to act as a guide to a group of aid workers on a humanitarian mission in Burma. However, when the Burmese army captures the group, he mounts a violent one-man rescue mission to try to save the missionaries.

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: A group set out on safari into the heart of the Congo. Each have their different reasons for the trip, but nothing could have prepared them for the greatest danger - a troop of intelligent killer apes.

programme.title: Ghost Rider: Spirit of Vengeance
programme.desc: Johnny Blaze gets a chance to rid himself of the Ghost Rider curse forever when members of a secret church hire him to save a boy from Satan.

programme.title: Money Train
programme.desc: A pair of transit policemen decide to raid a New York subway train loaded with money. Foster brothers John and Charlie have held a lifelong fantasy of robbing the networks money train, which collects millions of dollars each night from the citys subway stations. In addition to trying to deceive their boss, the boys must also contend with a beautiful new decoy cop.

programme.desc: A group set out on safari into the heart of the Congo. Each have their different reasons for the trip, but nothing could have prepared them for the greatest danger - a troop of intelligent killer apes.

programme.title: Ghost Rider: Spirit of Vengeance
programme.desc: Johnny Blaze gets a chance to rid himself of the Ghost Rider curse forever when members of a secret church hire him to save a boy from Satan.

programme.title: Money Train
programme.desc: A pair of transit policemen decide to raid a New York subway train loaded with money. Foster brothers John and Charlie have held a lifelong fantasy of robbing the networks money train, which collects millions of dollars each night from the citys subway stations. In addition to trying to deceive their boss, the boys must also contend with a beautiful new decoy cop.

programme.title: Money Train
programme.desc: A pair of transit policemen decide to raid a New York subway train loaded with money. Foster brothers John and Charlie have held a lifelong fantasy of robbing the networks money train, which collects millions of dollars each night from the citys subway stations. In addition to trying to deceive their boss, the boys must also contend with a beautiful new decoy cop.

programme.title: Buffalo Kids
programme.desc: Arriving in New York City in 1886, two orphaned Irish siblings embark on a wild cross-country journey aboard a transcontinental train. They make a new friend and encounter heroes and villains in their quest to find a new home.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry: Cowboy Up!
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry are in the Wild West where they help save a ranch from the hands of a greedy villain. The rivals team up to help a cowgirl and her brother save their homestead from a greedy land-grabber.

programme.title: Curious George
programme.desc: Curious George is an inquisitive little monkey with an insatiable taste for adventure. Georges fun-loving enthusiastic nature endears him to new friends, but also lands him in a series of misadventures.

programme.title: Transformers One
programme.desc: Brothers-in-arms Orion Pax and D-16 become sworn enemies Optimus Prime and Megatron.

programme.title: The Wild Thornberrys Movie
programme.desc: A feature-length spin-off from the TV series, the Thornberry family - led by natural history film-maker Colonel Radcliff Thornberry - head to deepest Africa. Once there, daughter Eliza - after meeting a shaman - can talk to the animals, a skill that stands her in good stead to foil a dastardly plot by poachers to kill a herd of elephants for their ivory.

programme.title: Shark Tale
programme.desc: A fast-talking fish gains fame after taking credit for the accidental death of a shark mobster. While enjoying the popularity at first, his tall tale starts to unravel as others begin to suspect that he is not the Defender of the Reef after all, and when the sharks enemies get involved, his lies lead him into dangerous waters. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: Fireheart
programme.desc: In New York City in 1932, women are not allowed to be firefighters. When the citys firemen disappear in mysterious fires, Georgia Nolan sees a golden opportunity. She disguises herself as Joe and joins a team of improvised firemen.

programme.title: Madagascar
programme.desc: Spoiled by their upbringing and with no idea of what wildlife is really like, Alex the lion, Marty the zebra and hypochondriac giraffe Melman swap New York Central Zoo for madcap Madagascar, on a journey to find their friend.

programme.title: Sing
programme.desc: A pig, a mouse, a porcupine, a gorilla, an elephant and other animals gather at a koalas theatre for a singing competition.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 2
programme.desc: Po must unlock secrets of his past in order to defeat a formidable villain who plans to wipe out kung fu and conquer China. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie
programme.desc: Flightless birds lead a mostly happy existence, except for Red, who just cant get past the daily annoyances of life. His temperament leads him to anger management class, where he meets fellow misfits Chuck and Bomb. Red becomes even more agitated when his feathered brethren welcome green pigs to their island paradise. As the swine begin to get under his skin, Red joins forces with Chuck and Bomb to investigate the real reason behind their mysterious arrival.

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie 2
programme.desc: Red, Chuck, Bomb and the rest of their feathered friends are surprised when a green pig suggests that they put aside their differences and unite to fight a common threat. Aggressive birds from an island covered in ice are planning to use an elaborate weapon to destroy the fowl and swine way of life. After picking their best and brightest, the birds and pigs come up with a scheme to infiltrate the island, deactivate the device and return to their respective paradises intact.

programme.title: Buffalo Kids
programme.desc: Arriving in New York City in 1886, two orphaned Irish siblings embark on a wild cross-country journey aboard a transcontinental train. They make a new friend and encounter heroes and villains in their quest to find a new home.

programme.title: Over the Hedge
programme.desc: An opportunistic raccoon teaches fellow animals about the edible treasures that the new humans in the neighbourhood conveniently leave outdoors.

programme.title: Rugrats Go Wild
programme.desc: The children and their bickering family are stranded on a desert island. Fortunately help is at hand from the Thornberry family, who are visiting the island to film a rare snow leopard. Once again, animal-understanding Eliza saves the day.

programme.title: Teen Titans GO! to the Movies
programme.desc: With a few madcap ideas and a song in their hearts, the Teen Titans head to Hollywood to fulfill their dreams. Things soon go awry, however, when a supervillain plans to take over the planet, putting the very fate of the young heroes on the line.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop
programme.desc: A fast-talking cop trails his best friends killer from the alleys of Detroit to the posh galleries of Beverly Hills.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber To
programme.desc: Twenty years after their last adventure, good-hearted, yet dimwitted best friends, Harry Dunne and Lloyd Christmas head out in search for Harrys long lost daughter, and Lloyds in love again.

programme.title: Were the Millers
programme.desc: Indebted to a big-time drug lord, a pot dealer travels to Mexico with a fake family and a camper to pick up a large shipment and smuggle it into the U.S.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: Rachel Chu is happy to accompany her longtime boyfriend, Nick, to his best friends wedding in Singapore. Shes also surprised to learn that Nicks family is extremely wealthy and hes considered one of the countrys most eligible bachelors. Thrust into the spotlight, Rachel must now contend with jealous socialites, quirky relatives and something far, far worse: Nicks disapproving mother.

programme.title: The Longest Yard
programme.desc: Paul `Wrecking Crewe was a revered football superstar back in his day, but that time has since faded. When a messy drunk driving incident lands him in jail, Paul finds he was specifically requested by Warden Hazen, a duplicitous prison official well aware of Pauls athletic skills. Paul has been assigned the task of assembling a team of convicts, to square off in a big football game against the sadistic guards.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Sherman is getting married to Denise Gains but his alter-ego Buddy Love keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts Buddys genes, but an accident and a dog hair see Buddy take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, Sherman and Denise perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until Buddy steals it.

programme.title: You, Me and Dupree
programme.desc: Carl is in seventh heaven when he marries his gorgeous girlfriend Molly in Hawaii. After a blissful honeymoon, they get back to find best man Dupree jobless, penniless and homeless. When Carl offers him a place to crash, he has no idea of the havoc that the blonde bum is about to cause.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: The continuing adventures of the Portokalos family. A follow-up to the 2002 comedy, My Big Fat Greek Wedding.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Video game experts are recruited by the military to fight 1980s-era video game characters whove attacked New York.

programme.title: The School of Rock
programme.desc: After guitarist Dewey is kicked out of his own band, he pretends to be a teacher. When he hears the kids play, he realises they could be his support group in the Battle of the Bands, and hell finally get to be the rock star he knows hes destined to be.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
programme.desc: Tale about an unconventional sleuths attempts to find a football teams stolen mascot dolphin. The Miami Dolphins are aghast when their beloved Snowflake is abducted one week before the all-important Super Bowl, so they call in Ace Ventura, a private eye who uses unorthodox methods to retrieve missing animals.

programme.title: One of Them Days
programme.desc: When her boyfriend takes her rent money, Alyssa and her roommate race against the clock to avoid eviction and keep their friendship intact.

programme.title: The Terminal
programme.desc: Eastern European visitor Viktor arrives in New York only to find that his papers are no longer valid. Rules being rules, airport chief Dixon cant let Viktor into America, or let him leave. Viktor has to survive by his wits, and slowly becomes the darling of the airport, as his sweet nature charms all who work there - except Dixon.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: Ruthless silver miner, turned oil prospector, Daniel Plainview moves to oil-rich California. Using his adopted son HW to project a trustworthy, family-man image, Plainview cons local landowners into selling him their valuable properties for a pittance. However, local preacher Eli Sunday suspects Plainviews motives and intentions, starting a slow-burning feud that threatens both their lives.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Rob Peace
programme.desc: Raised by his devoted mother, a brilliant young man risks everything hes worked for to free his imprisoned father.

programme.title: Anatomy of a Murder
programme.desc: Frederick Manion, an army lieutenant, is arrested for the murder of bartender, Barney Quill. In defence, he claims that the victim had beaten and raped his wife. With such evidence somewhat lacking, Manions lawyer, Paul Biegler attempts to save his defendant from prosecution, setting his assistants in search of witnesses.

programme.title: Schindlers List
programme.desc: True story of German businessman Oskar Schindlers efforts to save his Jewish workers from being exterminated in Nazi concentration camps.

programme.title: Ferrari
programme.desc: During the summer of 1957, bankruptcy looms over the company that Enzo Ferrari and his wife built 10 years earlier. He decides to roll the dice and wager it all on the iconic Mille Miglia, a treacherous 1,000-mile race across Italy.

programme.title: Dear John
programme.desc: Whilst on leave, a Marine falls in love with a college student. The long-distance relationship is then tested when the Marine decides to re-enlist post-9/11.

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: Following the adventures of The Dreamettes, an all-girl singing group. Theyre going nowhere fast until they meet fast-talking car salesman-come-manager who has ambitions to make a fortune selling black music to a white audience. He persuades them to become backing singers for James `Thunder Early, but the larger-than-life lead singer Effie White must step out of the spotlight in favour of the more image-friendly Deena Jones.

programme.title: Mamma Mia!
programme.desc: Set on a Greek island, a young woman who is about to be married suspects that any one of three men could be her father. She invites them all to her wedding without telling her mother. Movie adaptation of the musical, set to Abbas greatest hits.

programme.title: Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again
programme.desc: In 1979 Donna falls in love with Sam while embarking on a series of adventures throughout Europe. In the present day, Donnas pregnant daughter reunites with her mothers old friends and boyfriends on the Greek island of Kalokairi.

programme.title: The Holiday
programme.desc: Dumped and depressed, English rose Iris agrees to swap homes with similarly unlucky in love Californian Amanda for a much-needed break. Iris finds herself in a palatial Hollywood mansion while Amanda navigates the lanes of a picture-perfect English village. Soon enough, both lovelorn ladies bump into local lads perfect for a romantic pick-me-up.

programme.title: The Good Half
programme.desc: A man returns home to Cleveland for his mothers funeral, where he must confront his grief, reconnect with estranged family members, and forge new relationships.

programme.title: The Good Half

programme.title: The Good Half
programme.desc: A man returns home to Cleveland for his mothers funeral, where he must confront his grief, reconnect with estranged family members, and forge new relationships.

programme.title: Finding Neverland
programme.desc: Its London in 1904, and writer JM Barrie is inspired by a family he meets, mother Sylvia and her four children, Peter, Jack, George and Michael. From the time he spends with them, he writes the famous childrens novel `Peter Pan.

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Two twin brothers, Jared and Simon, and their sister Mallory are relocated by their mother to their great-great uncles creepy home in the middle of nowhere. Exploring, Jared finds his great-great uncles secret study and a book, the `Field Guide to the Fantastical World around Them, which opens up a world of goblins, spirits, ogres, trolls and griffins, some of whom are friendly and helpful and others not.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Philosophers Stone
programme.desc: Big-screen adaptation of the best-selling novel by JK Rowling about an 11-year-old boy living with his cruel aunt and uncle who learns that he is the orphaned son of powerful wizards. Harry is offered a place at Hogwarts, a prestigious boarding school for wizards, where he begins piecing together the mystery of his parents deaths with the help of his new-found friends.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
programme.desc: The second instalment of boy wizard Harry Potters adventures at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, based on the novel by JK Rowling. A mysterious elf tells Harry to expect trouble during his second year at Hogwarts, but nothing can prepare him for trees that fight back, flying cars, spiders that talk and deadly warnings written in blood on the walls of the school.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
programme.desc: Harry, Hermione and Ron return for a third year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, but the school is under lockdown as notorious murderer Sirius Black has escaped from the jail of Azkaban and apparently has a score to settle with Harry. Hermione has a trick up her sleeve for getting to all her classes on time, which comes in handy in solving the latest mystery for the magical students.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
programme.desc: Harry is mysteriously selected to compete in the prestigious Triwizard Tournament, a thrilling competition that pits him against more experienced students from Hogwarts and two rival wizarding schools. Meanwhile, supporters of the evil Lord Voldemort send a shockwave of fear throughout the wizard community when their Dark Mark scorches the sky at the Quidditch World Cup, signalling a return to power.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
programme.desc: Harry is dismayed when the Ministry of Magic denies Voldemorts return and appoints a nasty new teacher at Hogwarts to keep an eye on Dumbledore. The new teachers constant meddling with the curriculum convinces the students that school cannot prepare them for the battle ahead, so they form a secret duelling club with Harry as their tutor.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
programme.desc: Harry and the gang confront the terrifying truth that Lord Voldemort is back and Hogwarts is in danger.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
programme.desc: Following Dumbledores death, Lord Voldemort and his cronies have taken over the Ministry of Magic and are hellbent on killing Harry Potter. As a result, the good wizards of the Order of the Phoenix arrive at Harrys home and whisk him to safety, but the Death Eaters are hot on his trail. Harry, Hermione and Ron set out on a epic quest to destroy all the locate and destroy all the horcruxes.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
programme.desc: Harry, Ron and Hermione have escaped Bellatrix Lestranges clutches, but their getaway has come at a price. Dobby has been killed, meanwhile Lord Voldemort has acquired the highly powerful Elder Wand from Dumbledores tomb. Still on a quest to destroy the Horcruxes that hold the pieces of Voldemorts soul, Harry breaks into Bellatrix vault, where he finds a Horcrux.

A mysterious elf tells Harry to expect trouble during his second year at Hogwarts, but nothing can prepare him for trees that fight back, flying cars, spiders that talk and deadly warnings written in blood on the walls of the school.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
programme.desc: Harry, Hermione and Ron return for a third year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, but the school is under lockdown as notorious murderer Sirius Black has escaped from the jail of Azkaban and apparently has a score to settle with Harry. Hermione has a trick up her sleeve for getting to all her classes on time, which comes in handy in solving the latest mystery for the magical students.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
programme.desc: Harry is mysteriously selected to compete in the prestigious Triwizard Tournament, a thrilling competition that pits him against more experienced students from Hogwarts and two rival wizarding schools. Meanwhile, supporters of the evil Lord Voldemort send a shockwave of fear throughout the wizard community when their Dark Mark scorches the sky at the Quidditch World Cup, signalling a return to power.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
programme.desc: Harry is dismayed when the Ministry of Magic denies Voldemorts return and appoints a nasty new teacher at Hogwarts to keep an eye on Dumbledore. The new teachers constant meddling with the curriculum convinces the students that school cannot prepare them for the battle ahead, so they form a secret duelling club with Harry as their tutor.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
programme.desc: Harry and the gang confront the terrifying truth that Lord Voldemort is back and Hogwarts is in danger.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
programme.desc: Following Dumbledores death, Lord Voldemort and his cronies have taken over the Ministry of Magic and are hellbent on killing Harry Potter. As a result, the good wizards of the Order of the Phoenix arrive at Harrys home and whisk him to safety, but the Death Eaters are hot on his trail. Harry, Hermione and Ron set out on a epic quest to destroy all the locate and destroy all the horcruxes.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
programme.desc: Harry, Ron and Hermione have escaped Bellatrix Lestranges clutches, but their getaway has come at a price. Dobby has been killed, meanwhile Lord Voldemort has acquired the highly powerful Elder Wand from Dumbledores tomb. Still on a quest to destroy the Horcruxes that hold the pieces of Voldemorts soul, Harry breaks into Bellatrix vault, where he finds a Horcrux.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Philosophers Stone
programme.desc: Big-screen adaptation of the best-selling novel by JK Rowling about an 11-year-old boy living with his cruel aunt and uncle who learns that he is the orphaned son of powerful wizards. Harry is offered a place at Hogwarts, a prestigious boarding school for wizards, where he begins piecing together the mystery of his parents deaths with the help of his new-found friends.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Philosophers Stone
programme.desc: Big-screen adaptation of the best-selling novel by JK Rowling about an 11-year-old boy living with his cruel aunt and uncle who learns that he is the orphaned son of powerful wizards. Harry is offered a place at Hogwarts, a prestigious boarding school for wizards, where he begins piecing together the mystery of his parents deaths with the help of his new-found friends.

programme.title: Taxi Driver
programme.desc: New York City cab driver Travis Bickle constantly reflects on the ugly corruption of life around him, and becomes increasingly disturbed over his own loneliness and alienation. In nearly every phase of his life, Bickle remains a complete outsider, failing to make emotional contact with anyone. Unable to sleep night after night, Travis haunts the local pornography emporiums to find diversion.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger
programme.desc: Investigating the assassination of a friend of the President, CIA agent Ryan discovers that his friend was in league with the Colombian drugs cartels. In revenge, a paramilitary force is sent in to wipe out the drug lords but when the operation goes wrong, theyre abandoned by their country. Now their only hope is Ryan and fellow renegade operative Clark.

programme.title: Last Action Hero
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Danny is given a magic ticket by a strange projectionist and is transported into the cinema screen. Thanks to his advance knowledge of the plot, he is able to help his silver-screen hero out of an awkward situation and becomes his partner. Theres trouble in store for the unlikely duo when the villain tries to seize the magic ticket.

programme.title: Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves
programme.desc: On his return from the Crusades, Robin of Locksley learns that his father has been murdered by the tyrannical Sheriff of Nottingham and embarks on a campaign of guerrilla warfare to protect King Richards throne. Fight scenes are lively and inventive, and a set piece fought under the forest canopy pulls out all the stops.

programme.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
programme.desc: Epic tale in which an intrepid archaeologist tries to beat a band of Nazis to a unique religious relic which is central to their plans for world domination. Battling against a snake phobia and a vengeful ex-girlfriend, Indiana Jones is in constant peril, making hairs-breadth escapes at every turn in this celebration of the innocent adventure movies of an earlier era.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
programme.desc: Adventure sequel. Intrepid archaeologist Indiana Jones, on the trail of fortune and glory in Old Shanghai, is ricocheted into a dangerous adventure in India. With his faithful companion Short Round and nightclub singer Willie Scott, Indie goes in search of the magical Sankara stone, and uncovers an ancient evil which threatens all who come into contact with it.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
programme.desc: The intrepid explorer Indiana Jones sets out to rescue his father, a medievalist who has vanished while searching for the Holy Grail. Following clues in the old mans notebook, Indy arrives in Venice, where he enlists the help of a beautiful academic, but they are not the only ones who are on the trail, and some sinister old enemies soon come out of the woodwork.

programme.title: Blade Runner
programme.desc: An ex-cop sets out on the trail of androids who have mutinied in a bid to extend their limited lifespan and fled back to Earth.

programme.title: Men in Black
programme.desc: The secretive Men in Black are agents charged with regulating the aliens who have settled on Earth and ensure that they remain undetected. New recruit J and his partner K must find and stop an intergalactic terrorist bent on assassinating two ambassadors from opposing galaxies before they can make peace.

programme.title: The Shining
programme.desc: Frustrated writer Jack Torrance takes a job as the winter caretaker at the ominous, mountain-locked Overlook Hotel so that he can write in peace. When he arrives there with his wife and son, they learn that the previous caretaker had gone mad. Slowly Jack becomes possessed by the evil, demonic presence in the hotel.

programme.title: Friday the 13th, Part II
programme.desc: Jason returns to avenge the death of his decapitated mother with a pitchfork and a thirst for blood. Teenagers at a nearby camp fall prey to the killer in the woods in this hillbilly horror flick.

programme.title: Friday the 13th - Part III
programme.desc: Jason is still on the loose. While the hunt for him continues, another group of teenagers arrive at Lake Crystal. Among them is Chris, who is troubled by visions from the past where she was attacked in the woods by a deformed monster, only to awake safe in her bed. Determined to face her demons, she and her boyfriend Rick are among the group partying at the Lake but Jason is ready to exact revenge.

programme.title: Event Horizon
programme.desc: After disappearing for seven years, revolutionary spaceship Event Horizon is rediscovered. The team of scientists sent to investigate find that the entire crew is dead, and a terrifying, malevolent presence is lurking on board.

programme.title: Event Horizon
programme.desc: After disappearing for seven years, revolutionary spaceship Event Horizon is rediscovered. The team of scientists sent to investigate find that the entire crew is dead, and a terrifying, malevolent presence is lurking on board.

programme.title: Event Horizon
programme.desc: After disappearing for seven years, revolutionary spaceship Event Horizon is rediscovered. The team of scientists sent to investigate find that the entire crew is dead, and a terrifying, malevolent presence is lurking on board.

programme.title: King Kong
programme.desc: A down-on-her-luck actress accepts an offer to star in a film shot on a mysterious island. While there, the actress is abducted by natives who offer her as a sacrifice to a giant ape, which instead of harming the starlet becomes smitten with her. The crew manage to capture the ape and bring it back to Manhattan to exhibit as a showpiece. However, on the shows opening night, things go horribly wrong.

programme.title: Pompeii
programme.desc: As Mount Vesuvius rains down lava and ash, a gladiator (Kit Harington) races to save the woman (Emily Browning) he loves before the city collapses.

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: A group set out on safari into the heart of the Congo. Each have their different reasons for the trip, but nothing could have prepared them for the greatest danger - a troop of intelligent killer apes.

programme.title: Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom
programme.desc: Black Manta wields the power of the mythic Black Trident to unleash an ancient and malevolent force. Hoping to end his reign of terror, Aquaman forges an unlikely alliance with his brother to protect their kingdom and save the world from destruction.

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: Though struggling with the ramifications of his extraordinary origin and abilities, young Clark Kent must become a hero and save those he loves from a dire threat.

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: The heir to a newspaper fortune joins forces with a resourceful company employee to try to bring a powerful Los Angeles crime lord to justice.

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A defence attorney hires an enigmatic ex-Army investigator to tackle the case of a highly trained sniper who apparently murdered five people at random.

programme.title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back
programme.desc: Investigator Jack Reacher goes on the lam to uncover the truth behind a major government conspiracy that involves the death of U.S. soldiers.

programme.title: The Da Vinci Code
programme.desc: The curator of the Louvre museum is murdered, leaving behind a chain of obscure clues to a world-changing secret. Cryptologist Sophie Neveu and Harvard professor Robert Langdon embark on a race against time to uncover the precious truth before it falls into the wrong hands.

programme.title: Angels and Demons
programme.desc: Having ruffled the feathers of the Catholic Church with his controversial investigations into Christian history, Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon is surprised to be approached by the Popes emissaries for help. Following the Popes recent death, the four candidates most likely to take the pontiffs place have been kidnapped by a mysterious organisation known as the Illuminati.

programme.title: Inferno
programme.desc: An amnesiac symbologist and a doctor race across Europe and against time to stop a madman from unleashing a virus that could wipe out half of the worlds population.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Saturday Night
programme.desc: To celebrate the release of the film Saturday Night, join the Cinema List as we explore 50 years of hilarious films from the SNL cast - including Waynes World, Bridesmaids and more.

programme.title: Baby Driver
programme.desc: Baby, a music-loving orphan also happens to be the prodigiously talented go-to getaway driver for heist mastermind Doc. With the perfect soundtrack picked out for each and every job, Baby ensures Docs violent, bank-robbing cronies - including Buddy, Bats and Darling - get in and out of Dodge before its too late. Hes not in it for the long haul though, hoping to nail one last job before riding off into the sunset with beautiful diner waitress Debora. Easier said than done.

programme.title: Code 3
programme.desc: On his final 24-hour shift, a burned-out paramedic is tasked with training his eager but inexperienced replacement. What starts as a routine night quickly spirals into a chaotic odyssey that tests their endurance, instincts and sense of humour.

programme.title: It Feeds
programme.desc: A clairvoyant therapist confronts her own personal demons while trying to save a young girl who believes a malevolent entity is feeding on her.

programme.title: Juliet and Romeo
programme.desc: The greatest love story of all time, set as an original pop musical. Based on the real story that inspired William Shakespeares Romeo and Juliet.

programme.title: grow
programme.desc: An exuberant tale full of giant pumpkins, madcap characters and a little girl who just might be a pumpkin-growing savant. (2025, 107 mins)

programme.title: The Stranger in My Home
programme.desc: Ali meets a mysterious man who claims to be the father of her teenage daughter, Katie. What begins as an unsettling encounter soon spirals into a nightmare of long-buried secrets, lies and obsession.

programme.title: Presence
programme.desc: A family becomes convinced they are not alone after moving into their new home in the suburbs.

programme.title: Love Hurts
programme.desc: Marvin is a Milwaukee realtor who receives a crimson envelope from a former partner-in-crime whom he left for dead. He now finds himself thrust back into a world of ruthless hit men and double-crosses that turn his open houses into deadly war zones.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Core
programme.desc: The world is struck by inexplicable phenomena - Romes Colosseum explodes, Londons pigeons go berserk - until it becomes apparent that the planets core has stopped moving, causing electro-magnetic mayhem. The only hope lies in a crack team of scientists burrowing to the core and re-starting earths engine, but is the disaster natural or is there a more sinister explanation?

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Slingshot
programme.desc: An astronaut struggles to maintain his grip on reality during a possibly fatally compromised mission to Saturns moon, Titan.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Concrete Utopia
programme.desc: After a massive earthquake, only one apartment building is left standing in Seoul, South Korea. Survivors flock to Hwang Gung Apartments, but residents cannot cope with the increasing numbers.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: A fleet of ships is forced to do battle with an armada of unknown origins in order to discover and thwart their destructive goals.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Simulant
programme.desc: A humanoid A.I.s attempt at winning a grieving widows heart puts it in the path of a government agent trying to stop the rise of machine consciousness.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Voyagers
programme.desc: Set in the near future, the film chronicles the odyssey of 30 young men and women who are sent deep into space on a multi-generational mission in search of a new home. The mission descends into madness, as the crew reverts to its most primal state, not knowing if the real threat they face is whats outside the ship or who theyre becoming inside it.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Riddick
programme.desc: Left for dead on a sun-scorched planet, wanted criminal Riddick must confront two teams of mercenaries, one of whom is led by a man from his past.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: Awakened from their hibernation pods 90 years early, two space travellers enjoy the pleasures of a budding romance until they discover that their ship is in imminent danger.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire
programme.desc: The Spenglers return to the New York City firehouse where the original Ghostbusters have taken ghost-busting to the next level. When the discovery of an ancient artefact unleashes an evil force, Ghostbusters new and old must unite to save the world.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Live Die Repeat: Edge of Tomorrow
programme.desc: A soldier who was killed in action gets caught up in a time loop, in which he repeatedly relives his last battle. However, the more times he fights, the closer he gets to discovering how to defeat the alien enemy.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Concrete Utopia
programme.desc: After a massive earthquake, only one apartment building is left standing in Seoul, South Korea. Survivors flock to Hwang Gung Apartments, but residents cannot cope with the increasing numbers.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: After years of experimentation, brilliant but arrogant scientist Sebastian Caine has discovered a way to make matter invisible. Determined to achieve the ultimate breakthrough, Caine pushes his team to move to the next phase - using himself as the subject. The test is a success, but when the process cant be reversed, Caine seems doomed to a future without flesh.

programme.desc: An astronaut struggles to maintain his grip on reality during a possibly fatally compromised mission to Saturns moon, Titan.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Concrete Utopia
programme.desc: After a massive earthquake, only one apartment building is left standing in Seoul, South Korea. Survivors flock to Hwang Gung Apartments, but residents cannot cope with the increasing numbers.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: A fleet of ships is forced to do battle with an armada of unknown origins in order to discover and thwart their destructive goals.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Simulant
programme.desc: A humanoid A.I.s attempt at winning a grieving widows heart puts it in the path of a government agent trying to stop the rise of machine consciousness.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Voyagers
programme.desc: Set in the near future, the film chronicles the odyssey of 30 young men and women who are sent deep into space on a multi-generational mission in search of a new home. The mission descends into madness, as the crew reverts to its most primal state, not knowing if the real threat they face is whats outside the ship or who theyre becoming inside it.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Riddick
programme.desc: Left for dead on a sun-scorched planet, wanted criminal Riddick must confront two teams of mercenaries, one of whom is led by a man from his past.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: Awakened from their hibernation pods 90 years early, two space travellers enjoy the pleasures of a budding romance until they discover that their ship is in imminent danger.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire
programme.desc: The Spenglers return to the New York City firehouse where the original Ghostbusters have taken ghost-busting to the next level. When the discovery of an ancient artefact unleashes an evil force, Ghostbusters new and old must unite to save the world.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Live Die Repeat: Edge of Tomorrow
programme.desc: A soldier who was killed in action gets caught up in a time loop, in which he repeatedly relives his last battle. However, the more times he fights, the closer he gets to discovering how to defeat the alien enemy.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Concrete Utopia
programme.desc: After a massive earthquake, only one apartment building is left standing in Seoul, South Korea. Survivors flock to Hwang Gung Apartments, but residents cannot cope with the increasing numbers.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: After years of experimentation, brilliant but arrogant scientist Sebastian Caine has discovered a way to make matter invisible. Determined to achieve the ultimate breakthrough, Caine pushes his team to move to the next phase - using himself as the subject. The test is a success, but when the process cant be reversed, Caine seems doomed to a future without flesh.

programme.title: A Place Called Silence
programme.desc: Chen Yutong, a girls middle school student, was bullied at school, but her mother Li Han was unable to save her daughter from the "hell." Everyone around her turned a blind eye, and a collective silence brewed greater violence.

programme.title: Gloria
programme.desc: The mob eliminates Jack Dawn and his family. His six year old son, Phil, escapes with Gloria, the girlfriend of one of the gangsters, but they are chased because of a book containing mop accounts.

programme.title: Parallel
programme.desc: Following the journey of Vanessa, a grief-stricken woman who mysteriously finds herself navigating between parallel spaces.

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: After a long day, LA taxi driver Max is about to knock off when sharp-suited Vincent offers him $600 to make five stops. Sounds good until Vincent turns out to be a merciless hitman and each one of those stops involves a hit. As the night goes on, Max starts to wonder if hell live to see the sunrise, as the pair are hunted by the police and the FBI.

programme.title: Nightcrawler
programme.desc: A driven young man named Lou stumbles upon the underground world of Los Angeles freelance crime journalism.

programme.title: Oceans Thirteen
programme.desc: The remaining members of Danny Oceans gang regroup to jeopardise the nefarious plans of a businessman who double-crossed one of Dannys old friends.
