programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: The twins are asked to deliver a precious package to Madame Au Lait and decide that a ride with Pufferty is safest way to transport it. However, when Hopparoo challenges the lovable dog train to a race, the package bounces out of the carriage and embarks upon a crazy journey round Tickety Town, with Tommy and Tallulah in hot pursuit.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Tickety Town is covered in fallen leaves, so Tommy and Tallulah are using McCogginss new prototype street sweeper to clear them. However, in their eagerness to speed things up, they go against his instructions and press the turbo button. Suddenly, the sweeper goes haywire, rampaging through town and sucking up anything in its path, including Madame Au Laits clock key and very nearly Hopparoo too.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: The whole town gathers to take part in McCoggins treasure hunt. Whoever finds the most cogs will be the winner. Knowing that McCoggins hides the cogs in the same places every year, Tommy and Tallulah are cruising to victory, until they realise that a quick win will spoil everyones day, but when they borrow McCoggins special clockwork rollerskates to put the cogs back, the skates zoom out of control.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: The twins decide that everyone must get active and turn Tickety town into a boot camp. With Tommy banging his drum and Tallulah blowing on her trumpet, soon everyone is lifting, running, puffing and panting. They are all so exhausted that they fall fast asleep, but with Chime Time imminent, they must find a way to wake up Puffertys wheels.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: When Hopparoo bursts all their bubbles with his sharp ears, the twins use McCoggins extra-strong bubble mixture instead and blow a bubble so huge that it engulfs Battersby, Madame Au Lait, McCoggins, Lopsiloo, Chikidee and finally Tommy and Tallulah themselves! Where is Hopparoo? Only his sharp ears can free them for Chime Time.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Tommy and Tallulah love dressing up and surprising each other with their crazy costumes, but when they decide to surprise everybody else in town too Hopparoo is not impressed. In their efforts to surprise the bunny, they give the Spring Chicks such a fright that they barricade themselves in front of the clockhouse, blocking the way to Chime Time.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Madame Au Lait is teaching the twins pottery, and to inspire them she shows them a magnificent cow pot that she made on her wheel, but when she leaves them to their enthusiastic pot-making, they accidentally smash it and when they try to repair it, they only make things worse. Trying to re-create the pot is even more of a disaster. Huge quantities of clay fly from their wheel into the town, blocking Puffertys tracks.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Hopparoo is disappointed when everyone gathers for Measuring Time. He was sure hed grown more than that! Tommy and Tallulah have some crazy ideas about how to add inches, but a super-tall rabbit rampaging through town on stilts can only cause chaos.

programme.desc: The twins are under strict instructions to keep clean for Madame Au Laits town photograph, but this proves difficult when the rest of the town need their help with some messy jobs. So when its Photo Time, they are covered in mud, compost and feathers.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Tommy and Talluah are determined to throw a magnificent party for McCoggins birthday. They get everyone involved and have fun organising the decorations, music and food, but Chikidee gets stuck in a giant cake and rolls around causing chaos.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Tommy and Tallulah are trying to make everyone laugh, but McCoggins is not responding. The twins do everything they know to make him crack and eventually he laughs so loud that he gets a case of gigglitis, but McCoggins was working on a very delicate job at the clock and now they need to cure him in time for Chime Time.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Tommy is desperate to get the hang of the game of Whackerty so that he can compete in the town tournament. Everyone has different and unusual playing styles, but when he tries to copy them the results are disastrous. Somehow he must develop his own style to win.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Tickety legend has it that McCoggins is building an amazing model of the clockhouse out of lollipop sticks. No one has seen it yet and the whole town is waiting for the grand unveiling, but when McCoggins asks Tommy and Tallulah to help him finish his model, the twins accidentally smash it.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Tommy and Tallulah have such fun with their new friend Larry the Bug that they decide to adopt him as a pet, but just as they finish making him a home, Larry flies away! After spending the day chasing him all over town, they are surprised to discover that Larry has a family of cute little baby bugs.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Tommy and Tallulah enlist Battersby as their star performer for Show Time. Unfortunately, the magic trick they devise for him doesnt go to plan and soon Madame Au Lait is stuck down Hopparoos portable hole. Tallulahs trumpet is also trapped and she needs it for Chime Time.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of the Whale Trip
programme.desc: The puffins of Mossy Bay are excited to be going on a whale trip with Hercule Moustache. Hercule points out all manner of sights and sounds as they ride on Thelma the whale, but the boisterous puffins dont always listen to Hercule, and frequently interrupt the poor walrus. The puffins soon learn how important it is to listen to your elders when out on a trip.

programme.desc: In New Zealand, two wild fortresses protect the vulnerable native animals: One a remote island protected by a moat of saltwater, the other a hilltop citadel surrounded by a predator-proof barrier. This is the story of these delicate sanctuaries and the life that thrives within them.

programme.title: Gangs Of Baboon Falls
programme.desc: As the Zimbabwe and Zambia gangs negotiate predators as they forage on the river banks, the Victoria gang try to keep a new food source hidden from baboons and humans alike.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Elderly marmoset Jenny gets a visit from the vet before the arrival of a new life partner, while orangutan youngster Hujan begins to adjust to living life in the nursery.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Alison travels to Hampshire to rescue marmoset Clyde from a life in the pet trade, while the young orangutan Hujan gets to meet with older male Bulu in the nursery.

programme.title: Dogs With Extraordinary Jobs
programme.desc: A blind woman gets a running mate and a pack of dogs protect rhinos in Kenya. Meanwhile, a Border Collie protects visitors in Glacier National Park.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand
programme.desc: Spring on New Zealands east coast is a time of promise for the New Zealand Fur Seal and the Norther Royal Albatross. Theyve returned to their land to breed. But harsh terrain, fickle weather and hungry predators will conspire to make lives difficult for them. Only the strongest will survive to carry forward their legacy.

programme.title: Wildlife ER
programme.desc: Face a life-and-death struggle with vet Bec, who gives a koala joey mouth-to-mouth, and see vet Meaghan test her microsurgical skills on a baby fruit bats teeny toes. Catch a bath-averse python and tag along as rescuer Jo nabs a trapped barn owl.

programme.title: Deep Dive Australia
programme.desc: Saying goodbye to the tropics and dipping into cool southern-coast waters. Coming face-to-face with majestic grey nurse sharks, shape-shifting cuttlefish and huge blue whales, and playing with penguins and sea lions.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa
programme.desc: The Addo Elephant Park was founded in 1931 and is 1,640km2. It hosts more than 450 elephants and other mammals and was created in response to the elephant population falling as low as eleven.

programme.title: Gangs Of Baboon Falls

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: A visit from the vet awaits one of the parks strangest residents, while the small monkey team lose the battle to save tragic marmoset Koba, who had been taken out of the pet trade.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Alison looks forward to the prospect of baboons being at the park, while recently arrived marmoset Clyde, rescued from the pet trade, braves the great outdoors for the first time.

programme.title: Dogs With Extraordinary Jobs
programme.desc: Dogs are using their remarkable scenting skills for lifesaving conservation and pro-active environmental policing. In Canada, a team of canine detectives is sniffing out the destructive invasive zebra mussel.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand
programme.desc: New Zealands isolated islands are famed as an unusual paradise, home to a variety of unique wildlife. Best known for its flightless birds, ancient reptiles and coastal mammals, a closer look reveals another world. A land of miniature monsters, Lilliputian predators and tiny terrors that lead remarkable lives, where every hunter is also the hunted and survival is always a giant struggle. Journey into the undergrowth and discover life on a different scale.

programme.title: Wildlife ER
programme.desc: Watch senior vet Tim tutor new recruit Phil through an injured koala checkup, and track the teams solutions for animals plagued by the summer heat. Celebrate as vet Karina solves a puzzling frog case and releases an old friend whos ready to fly.

programme.title: Deep Dive North America
programme.desc: Bundle up as Lizzie heads north to tag sharks and witness first-hand the slow, sobering disappearance of sea ice. Do time in bear jail with polar bears who are caught raiding a town for food after their icy hunting grounds diminish.

programme.title: Waterworld Africa
programme.desc: Nestled on the western coast of South Africa lies an extraordinary cove that is host to an abundance of marine and bird life. It provides ample food and spurs a life cycle that reaches well beyond Africa. This is the Blue Lagoon.

programme.title: Killer Couples
programme.desc: "Killer Couples" is in the same vein of the long-running true-crime series "Snapped," which tells stories of people who commit murder or attempt murder, but with a focus on couples who commit crimes. Using re-creations and firsthand accounts, each episode digs into a case, telling the story of the couples romance, how the relationship evolved from love to manipulation, and what ultimately led the couple to commit the crime. The stories range from teenage lovers who go on a multistate crime spree to lesbian lovers who want to eliminate one of their husbands.

While Tylers career seems to be slipping downhill, Bryan, Jed and Mrs Cakeworthy appear to be in seventh heaven.

programme.sub-title: The Desperate Drive of Corporal Jones

programme.title: The Cleaner
programme.desc: Its Christmas Day and crime scene cleaner Wicky is looking forward to heading to the pub for Weasels Christmas raffle: first prize, an actual horse. All that stands in his way is a blood-soaked crime scene in an ice cream parlour, and a regular customer who isnt going to let a little thing like a murder stop him from getting the perfect peach melba ice-cream.

programme.title: Inside No. 9
programme.desc: Hard-as-nails detective inspector, divorcee and single mum Katrina is determined to crack the case of the missing boy. But theres also her drinking, her love life and her inner demons. She doesnt want help, but it turns up anyway.

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo heads to Chinatown to hear of the huge contribution Chinese immigrants made to the economy, working as miners and building the transcontinental railroad. He discovers an entrepreneurial community who overcame discrimination laid down by the law, and finds that fortune favours the brave with iconic Chinese treats created in America.

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: Following his Appletons guide, Michael Portillo makes a trip to the jewel in the crown of Americas National Parks, Yosemite, to behold its towering granite cliffs, its giant sequoia trees and cascading waterfalls. He discovers how early conservationists fought to protect it in law and encounters a `buffalo soldier in the heart of the forest. In Berkeley, Michael uncovers a catastrophic event, which hit the city of San Francisco hard in 1906.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: On the way to pick up two lovely 70s Lotus sports cars, Derek takes to the skies for his first ever helicopter flight in a 1967 Bell 47 chopper.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Daves drawn to a Fiat Uno 45 in hearing aid beige, a well-known manufacturers colour, with 36,000 miles on the clock.

programme.title: Secret Nazi Bases
programme.desc: A secret weapons programme in the heart of Austria that could have ended badly for the Allies - and may have indicated nuclear plans being concocted by Hitler.

programme.title: Nazi Hunters
programme.desc: The global search for the most sought-after World War II criminals. How Hitlers deputy Hermann Goering was captured by the Allies, leading to his suicide.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce looks at the most talked about finds of 2016 and reveals surprising updates. Art scholars searched for years for a missing work by eminent Victorian artist Alma-Tadema, but after it appeared at the Roadshow we follow the newly-restored painting as it ends up in an international exhibition.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the team make a return visit to Tewkesbury Abbey in Gloucestershire to uncover more treasures. Amongst the objects featured are an extremely heavy Tudor table, and an extensive collection of Maundy Money.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Dave goes to Wales in order to purchase a Sierra Cosworth, a sought-after car in the bidding market. Dad Derek gets his hands on a more sedate 1926 Standard Tourer - a quirky little motor.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek heads to Suffolk to collect two Bentleys with a majestic pedigree, with their own names: Cynthia a stunning 1963 S3 and Harry, a 1965 Continental.

programme.title: Russia with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: The second leg of Simon Reeves journey across Russia begins in Siberia and takes him to Russias far south west and the majestic Caucasus Mountains. From Lake Baikal, the oldest and deepest lake on earth, he takes the Trans-Siberian railway to the city of Krasnoyarsk - the scene of brutal violence in the 1990s - where a cafe now pays homage to Russias president Vladimir Putin.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: Bangers and Cash spin-off series that follows the journey of a vehicle purchased at a Mathewsons classic car auction, before being repaired, restored and re-auctioned.

programme.desc: Will and Gus look to make some quick cash as they fix and wrap a Toyota MR2 MK2. But is there money to be made in this low-spec car?

programme.title: The Legend of Michael Mishra
programme.desc: As a child, Bhaiyyaji, a Bihari tailor-turned-kidnapper, falls in love with Varsa. When she moves to Mumbai to become an actress, he tries to shed his criminal image in order to win her back.

programme.title: Prem Ratan Dhan Payo
programme.desc: A charitable, happy-go-lucky man embarks on a mission to meet a generous princess who helps people, so he takes the place of a prince.

programme.desc: Obsessed with day-time TV soaps, Ekta Santoshi starts suspecting her husband, Gopal, of having an affair with an unknown woman. Not satisfied with his explanations, she decides to investigate.

programme.desc: Aaja Nachle tells the story of a dancer who returns to India on the news of her gurus death, only to discover that life is not what it used to be.

programme.title: Munna Michael
programme.desc: The story of a boy from the streets of Teen Batti who idolises Michael Jackson.

programme.title: Veer-Zaara
programme.desc: Squadron Leader Veer Pratap Singh, a pilot in the Indian air force, rescues the stranded Zaara, a woman from Pakistan, following a bus accident, and their lives are forever bound. With all the ingredients of a classic love story, the film is a tale of love, separation, courage and sacrifice that unfolds over 22 years.

programme.title: Maatr
programme.desc: Vidya, whos left shattered after her daughter Tias murder, seeks vengeance by fighting the broken justice and criminal system.

programme.title: Tu Hai Mera Sunday
programme.desc: Five friends search for their own place to play football in Mumbai.

programme.desc: Brilliant mathematician Anand Kumar helps 30 smart but underprivileged students prepare for entrance exams for the Indian Institutes of Technology.

programme.desc: Following a twist of fate that results in the death of her dreams, Ishani becomes evasive as she embarks on a mission to reinvent herself and seek love.

programme.title: Anupamaa
programme.desc: Anupamaa, a warmhearted homemaker, receives neglect and ridicule in return for lavishing her family with affection, but there comes a time when she finds the ones who truly appreciate her.

programme.title: Udne Ki Aasha
programme.desc: Fate poses a threat to Sailees fairytale hopes by tying her in a lifelong bond with Sachin, an uncouth and emotionally scarred taxi driver who shuns the idea of romance and marriage.

programme.title: Advocate Anjali Awasthi
programme.desc: Struggling lawyer Anjali Awasthi is determined to restore her familys honour and achieve recognition in her field. Driven by her desire to realise her dreams, she takes on a challenging case that could be her big break.

programme.title: Singh Is Bliing
programme.desc: Tired of his ways, Raftaar Singh`s father gives him two options; to marry a fat girl Sweety or to work with his friend in Goa. Raftaar chooses the latter.

programme.title: Gadar: Ek Prem Katha
programme.desc: A Sikh trucker and an aristocratic Muslim woman fall in love against the backdrop of the 1947 partition.

programme.title: The Sabarmati Report
programme.desc: A journalist investigates the 2002 Godhra train burning in Gujarat. Years later, another reporter discovers his hidden report. They uncover a conspiracy involving powerful figures, facing threats as they pursue the truth.

programme.title: Crew
programme.desc: Hailed as `delectable by The Times of India, this Rajesh Krishnan-directed comedy follows three bold flight attendants caught in a gold smuggling ring.

programme.title: Raanjhanaa
programme.desc: The story of Kundan and his journey from a 13 year old boy in love who goes on to become a committed and spirited young man, whose experiences in life made him the person he is today.

programme.title: The Who Bhi Din
programme.desc: Rahul Sinha, A Famous Photojournalist, Returns To His Alma Mater As A Guest Speaker and takes a nostalgic trip down memory lane to relive his carefree school days and the moment he first fell in love.

programme.title: Flat No. 609
programme.desc: A couple move into a beautiful duplex and start experiencing paranormal activities.

programme.title: Ziddi
programme.desc: A hot-tempered man gets into trouble and makes enemies.

programme.title: Pure Bollywood
programme.desc: Some of the best soundtracks of Bollywood uncut.

programme.title: Shubh Mangal Saavdhan
programme.desc: Remake of `Kalyana Samayal Saadham. A couple fall in love and get married, but the groom discovers that he suffers from erectile dysfunction.

programme.title: Ganga Mai Ki Betiyaan
programme.desc: Ganga Mai is a resilient woman who is deserted by her husband for not giving birth to a son. Refusing to bow to societal expectations, she devotes herself to raising her three daughters with unwavering strength, grace, and affection.

programme.desc: A kabaddi champion from Rajasthan moves to Mumbai, where she battles all odds, reunites with her family, and fights to get her mother her rightful place in the family while chasing her dreams.
